name: Luxstay Serviced Apartment
address: Level 29, Vinhomes, 54A Nguyen Chi Thanh, Ba Dinh, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features a balcony. The property features views of the lake and is a few steps from Vincom Center Nguyen Chi Thanh. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

There is a seating area and a kitchen complete with an oven and a microwave. Towels and bed linen are provided at Luxstay Serviced Apartment. Other facilities at Luxstay Serviced Apartment include a terrace.

Giang Vo Exhibition Center is 1.1 km from Luxstay Serviced Apartment, while Vietnam Museum of Ethnology is 2.2 km away. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km from the property.
